archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0353
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a new or exsting customer, when I purchase a subscription, I want to charge my first cycle to my account at the point of purchase, so that I can start using it as soon as I get it in a frictionless way

properties.value: OOTB-invoice should be created? Why Role profile topic? Yes, for business customers an invoice should be created (digital only). "Role profile" because not every employee should be allowed to order subscriptions and charge it to the company account.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
